description: [APT28](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0007) has changed extensions on files containing exfiltrated data to make them appear benign, and renamed a web shell instance to appear as a legitimate OWA page.(Citation: Cybersecurity Advisory GRU Brute Force Campaign July 2021)

external_references.description: NSA, CISA, FBI, NCSC. (2021, July). Russian GRU Conducting Global Brute Force Campaign to Compromise Enterprise and Cloud Environments. Retrieved July 26, 2021.
external_references.source_name: Cybersecurity Advisory GRU Brute Force Campaign July 2021
